this post on blogs.msdn.com is interesting:

http://blogs.msdn.com/jgalla/a=
rchive/2006/11/17/transitioning-between-
soap-and-url-access.aspx

I wonder=
 if some at MS are starting to see the RESTful light? Although 
they are re=
ferring to a regular GET as "URL Access", it sits there 
right next to the =
SOAP alternative.

What is more, he clearly demonstrates a performance adva=
ntage from 
being able to stream (in .NET WS- clients you have to load the =
whole 
response into memory).

Alan Dean
